entry.title: Derby Black Midnight All Black Premium Round Rolled Leather Cattle Show Halter with Matching Chain Lead - One Year Limited Manufacturer’s Warranty
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Cattle
Price: 39.99

Derby Originals’ line of leather cattle show halters was designed to look elegant, remain beautiful for many years to come, and help to show off and complement the beauty of your cow or steer without detracting from the animal itself. These cattle show halters are available in many styles and a variety of colors and sizes designed to suit every breed of cow and every life stage. If you’re looking for an attractive, high-quality, elegant show halter at an amazing price, look no further! These new and improved cattle show halters were released in 2019 and feature new and improved sizing, and one year limited manufacturer’s warranties.

 

Features

NEW ALL BLACK DESIGN - this elegant Black Midnight cattle halter is our first show halter featuring an all black construction with black leather and hardware for a rich, elegant look that is sure to complement any cow.

AVAILABLE IN THREE SIZES - this leather halter is available in three sizes, Small, Medium, and Large.

INCLUDES MATCHING CHAIN LEAD - each of our Derby Originals leather show halters includes a matching 1” wide 48” leather lead with a 14” heavy-duty nickel plated control chain.

PERFECT FOR FAIR AND SHOWS – our Derby Originals leather show halters were designed for events from local fairs to the professional show ring. These halters have a high-class design and are built to last. These halters are great for 4H-ers!

ONE YEAR LIMITED MANUFACTURER'S WARRANTY - we’re proud to be the first company to offer one year warranties on our new cattle show halters. Visit https://www.derbyoriginals.com/pages/warranty-registration-1 for more information.

 

Size Chart

Small (350 lbs - 700 lbs)
Crown: 12" - 16"
Cheekpiece: 6"
Noseband: 9"

Medium (650 lbs - 1050 lbs)
Crown: 14" - 20"
Cheekpiece: 7"
Noseband: 10"

Large (950 lbs - 1500 lbs)
Crown: 16" - 22"
Cheekpiece: 8"
Noseband: 11"

entry.title: Weaver Livestock Pro Calf Blanket, Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Livestock
Price: 36.95

Keep your calf warm with these water-resistant blankets constructed of 900-denier material with a single layer 200-gram polyester fiber fill. Blanket doesn't hold moisture in against calf and features adjustable belly straps with quick-release buckles for easy on and off. Machine washable

entry.title: Weaver Leather Pig Whip/Dressage Whip
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Livestock
Price: 11.95

In exciting colors kids will love, this pig whip is quality constructed for maximum durability. A comfortable rubber handle provides extra grip. Measures 36" overall including popper.

ADORNED WITH SHOW SPOTS - these show halters feature shiny stainless show spots that provide contrast against the dark leather and add an elegant and royal feel.

AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE SIZES AND COLORS - this leather halter is available in three sizes, Small, Medium, and Large, and in two leather colors to best suit your taste and the color of your animal: deep Black and rich Havana.

entry.title: Livestock Adjustable Poly Neck Rope
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Livestock
Price: 9.95

  • Made from twisted, tight weave polypropylene, this neck rope features a slide adjustment to easily fit any neck size
  • A braided snap end offers added strength
  • Brass plated hardware
  • Measures 1/2" x 10"

entry.title: Stierwalt Breaking Halter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Livestock
Price: 9.95

Great for halter breaking young cattle. The quick pull-and-release action helps to prevent swollen jaws during training. The pressure points and easy slide action work together to acclimate calves to the feel of a show halter with a chain.
  • Special figure eight hardware designed by Kirk Stierwalt makes this halter one of a kind
  • Quick pull-and-release action helps prevent swollen jaws, unlike the slower release of conventional breaking halters
  • Pressure points and easy slide action help acclimate calf to the feel of a show halter
  • Leads measure approximately 8-1/2' long

entry.title: Weaver Leather Rounded Cattle Show Halter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Weaver Leather
Type: Cattle
Price: 37.95 - 39.95 (6 variants)

The best show halter on the market, this bridle leather halter features a rounded noseband and cheek pieces as well as durable corner stays. Leather is smoothed and finished for maximum comfort and style.
  • Double crown adjustments for the perfect fit
  • Durable nickel plated hardware
  • Soft, yet strong bridle leather
  • Rounded noseband and cheek pieces flatter every face
  • Matching shank with chain included

Included Components:
  • Comes complete with a 20" chain and 36" lead that is sewn for a sleek, refined look

  • 1" Nylon
  • Nickel Plated Hardware

entry.title: Derby Originals Adjustable Nylon Livestock Cattle Halters Available in Multiple Colors
entry.summary:
Vendor: Derby Originals
Type: Livestock
Price: 14.99

 

No matter what breed or type of cow you have, Derby has a nylon halter designed to fit them! With four sizes and five attractive color options, you're sure to find the perfect fit and style for your cow. These halters are a great all-purpose halter: affordable, high quality, and perfect for the barn or pasture. They're built with sturdy double nylon, have reinforced stitching, and durable nickel hardware. This is a halter that's built strong and made to last and look attractive for many years.

NEW IMPROVED SIZING - we've listened to our customers and have changed our sizing to be more accurate. "Newborn" is now "Small 250-500lbs", "Calf" is now "Medium 500-800lbs", "Cow" is now "Large 800-1400lbs", and "Steer" is now "X-Large 1400-2000+ lbs".

DESIGNED TO FIT ALL BREEDS - these figure-8 style nylon halters are designed to fit all dairy and beef breeds of cattle thanks to their adjustable design. More holes can be added to the crowns of these halters to adjust the fit as needed.

DURABLE AND CLASSIC DESIGN - these halters have an adjustable figure-8 design that makes them perfect for use with cows, foals, miniature horses, and more. Our halters are built to last and made with premium hardware and nylon.

AVAILABLE IN MULTIPLE COLORS – our cattle halters are available in five attractive colors: Black, Royal Blue, Lime Green, Red, and Pink, so that you can choose the color that best complements your cow!

NEW SIZING FOR 2020 - please be aware that you may receive halters with our old size names listed on them, but rest assured you have received the correct size you ordered and it matches our new sizing chart.

Size Chart
Small (350 lbs - 700 lbs)
Crown: 13.5" - 17.5"
Cheekpiece: 6.25"
Noseband: 9.5"

Medium (650 lbs - 1,050 lbs)
Crown: 15.5" - 19.5"
Cheekpiece: 7.25"
Noseband: 11"

Large (950 lbs - 1,500 lbs)
Crown: 19.5" - 23.5"
Cheekpiece: 8.25"
Noseband: 12.25"

X-Large (1,400 lbs - 1,650 lbs)
Crown: 25.5" - 29.5"
Cheekpiece: 9"
Noseband: 13"
